headline: American Airlines and Citi Launch the Citi / AAdvantage Globe Mastercard
summary: FORT WORTH, Texas & NEW YORK, October 19, 2025--American Airlines, Citi and Mastercard today unveiled the Citi® / AAdvantage® Globe™ Mastercard®—a new entry in the travel credit card market that reimagines what mid-tier means with access to premium benefits. Designed to maximize the travel journey, the Citi® / AAdvantage® Globe™ Mastercard® offers four Admirals Club® Globe™ passes, each valid for 24 hours; more opportunities to earn AAdvantage® miles and Loyalty Points toward status, including a
